html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-11362024-10-25ESDC
ActCanada Student Loans Act
Canada Student Financial Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations and the Canada Student Financial Assistance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending THE CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS AND THE CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) change the definition of "under-served rural or remote community" for the forgiveness benefit for doctors and nurses; and (2) for all areas considered Rural Areas by Statistic Canada be eligible for the forgiveness benefit, as will Population Centres of 30,000 or fewer.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0210 Publication Date: 2024-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending THE CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS AND THE CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE REGULATIONS in order to (1) change the definition of "under-served rural or remote community" for the forgiveness benefit for doctors and nurses; and (2) for all areas considered Rural Areas by Statistic Canada be eligible for the forgiveness benefit, as will Population Centres of 30,000 or fewer.
